title: I always hear that when we die, we'll see our family members or close friends. What if we weren't close to many people on earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: When a person is in the afterlife, their way of seeing things is completely different than here. After the life review, they see the situation from all sides and completely understand the other person and why they did what they did. So, all is instantly forgiven and completely replaced with love and caring for the other person. No matter what the issue was before, all is forgiven.
Maybe you would see the closet person you were with, or I guess you won’t see anyone then. This isn’t proven to be true though, so don’t rely on it to much.
